docs.snippet: Karolyi, the women’s national team coordinator who is retiring after the Games, helped start a training system key to the team’s sustained success....
docs.lead_paragraph: Karolyi, the women’s national team coordinator who is retiring after the Games, helped start a training system key to the team’s sustained success.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column profiles United States women's gymnastics team coach Martha Karolyi, who plans to retire following 2016 Olympic Games after 40 years in sport.

headline.main: Final Bow for Martha Karolyi, the Woman Who Lifted U.S. Gymnastics

docs.snippet: Football and men’s basketball, the biggest generators of revenue, accounted for 83 percent of the total from 1953 to 2014, a new study has determined....
docs.lead_paragraph: Football and men’s basketball, the biggest generators of revenue, accounted for 83 percent of the total from 1953 to 2014, a new study has determined.
docs.abstract: Temple University Sport Industry Research Center releases study showing 83 percent of major infractions in NCAA Division I from 1953 to 2014 were made by football and men's basketball teams, which also bring in most revenue; other college athletics news noted.

headline.main: Report Says Big-Money College Sports Draw Most Major Infractions
headline.print_headline: Study Says Big-Money Sports Draw Most Major Infractions

docs.abstract: Olympic games draw legion of armchair viewers more interested in athletes' toned physiques than in sports themselves.

headline.main: At the Olympics, Everyone’s Looking. Especially at the Men.

docs.snippet: An appeals court ruled against the state’s effort to operate sports books in its casinos and racetracks, closing a path to needed state revenue....
docs.lead_paragraph: An appeals court ruled against the state’s effort to operate sports books in its casinos and racetracks, closing a path to needed state revenue.
docs.abstract: United States Court of Appeals invalidates 2014 New Jersey law that would have given state much-needed revenue boost by legalizing sports betting at casinos and racetracks.

headline.main: Federal Court Blocks New Jersey Plan to Legalize Sports Betting
headline.print_headline: Federal Court Blocks New Jersey’s Plan to Legalize Wagering on Sports
